To proceed strategically, note that there’s a wall on the left and obstacles elsewhere. The best course of action is to maneuver towards the exit while avoiding enemies and using tunnels strategically.

Given the layout, you can attempt to move down or to the right. The next immediate action is to move down to (row 2, col 13).

``` Action:3 ```

This action will allow you to enter a space where there might be more navigational options towards the exit and avoid any immediate threats. I expect this will align with the strategy of keeping you out of the way from pursuers while also progressing towards the exit.
